definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: They should be able to document every step from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 他们也应该能够从零开始记录每一个步骤。

sentences.english: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始的索引。

sentences.english: This tutorial is specificly for those starting from zero.
sentences.chinese: 这篇入门就是为了从零开始的人而写的。

sentences.english: Gets the zero-based row index of the cell.
sentences.chinese: 获取单元格的从零开始的行索引。

sentences.english: Take note that the indexing is zero-based.
sentences.chinese: 注意，数组索引是从零开始的。

sentences.english: And most of these have been designed from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有这些机器人都是从零开始设计的。

sentences.english: I know it is not easy to create a top cycling team from zero.
sentences.chinese: 我知道从零开始建立一个顶级的自行车车队并不容易。

sentences.english: We prefer a "start from scratch" strategy.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢“从零开始”的策略。

sentences.english: In this case it did not, so we'll have to start from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 本例中的模型并不包含定义，因此我们必须从零开始。

sentences.english: And it will need to develop them from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 而这些却全要从零开始。

sentences.english: Because of my debts, I was starting from below zero.
sentences.chinese: 因为欠了一身债，我又要从零开始。

sentences.english: The zero-based position of the parameter in the parameter list.
sentences.chinese: 参数列表中参数从零开始的位置。

sentences.english: Zero-based index of an image within the image list.
sentences.chinese: 从零开始的索引图像在图像列表。

sentences.english: Following that analysis, the scripts are usually re-implemented from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些分析，脚本通常从零开始被重新执行。

sentences.english: The hood, cowl, radiator and fenders are scratch-built.
sentences.chinese: 发动机罩，罩，散热器和挡泥板是从零开始建造。

definition: every beginning is difficult (idiom)/getting started is always the hardest part
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

definition: to wade across the river, feeling for footholds as one goes (idiom)/to advance cautiously, step by step/to feel one's way forward
pinyin: mo1 zhe5 shi2 tou5 guo4 he2

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
switch to a job one was not trained for
